testcase.brief: Register user accesses successfully through https in topo5
testcase.description: 1:Configure passthrough CWP on ap ssid pass ssid pass default-user-profile-attr 1 ssid pass security aaa radius-server primary 10.155.30.219 shared-secret *** acct-port 1813 ssid pass security protocol-suite wpa2-aes-psk ascii-key *** ssid pass security additional-auth-method captive-web-portal reg-user-profile-attr 60 timer-display ssid pass security additional-auth-method captive-web-portal timer-display alert 10 ssid pass security additional-auth-method captive-web-portal redirect ssid pass web-server 2:Client requests a web page, result 1 3:Client fills all mandatory fields and submit, result 2

step.desc: config vlan ,ssids and bind them to interface
1:Configure (internal/passthrough/e-cwp) on ap, both auth and register mode
step.ssh: -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} security aaa radius-server primary ${pub.radius1.ip} shared-secret ${pub.radius1.sharesecret}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} security additional-auth-method captive-web-portal reg-user-profile-attr 1" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} security additional-auth-method captive-web-portal failure-redirect login-page" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} web-server" -v "save web-server-key 0 tftp://10.155.81.221:certs/server_keycert.pem" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} web-server ssl server-key 0" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "interface ${ssid_bind_interface} ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "user-profile ttt qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan1} attribute 1"

step.telnet: -v "_debug auth all" -v "_debug cgic all" -v "clear log b"

step.script: export PYTHONPATH=${auto.root.dir}; python ${auto.root.dir}/AerohiveGUI/scripts/cwp/cwp_login.py -r http://${sta1.mif.ip}:4444/wd/hub --parameters login.mode=register -t ff -f ${log.dir}/${log.file} -l info --preserve-session > ${log.dir}/register_session_id.log

step.log-match: -b "Guest CWP user is registered on if" -ps p "User Type=Guest User" -e "A CWP user registered from interface" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}
